_readme: This file configures Heroku Review Apps for the benefits-calculator frontend.
All environment variable VALUES must be set in the Heroku Pipeline UI under 'Review Apps > Review app config vars'.
This file only documents what variables are required - actual secret values are managed in Heroku, not committed to git.
name: MyFriendBen Benefits Calculator
description: Benefits eligibility screener frontend - Review App

REACT_APP_API_KEY.description: API authentication token for backend communication - Set in Heroku dashboard

REACT_APP_DOMAIN_URL.description: Backend API base URL - Set in Heroku dashboard (e.g., https://cobenefits-api-staging.herokuapp.com)

REACT_APP_STATE.description: Default state configuration (e.g., CO, IL, NC)

REACT_APP_ENERGY_CALCULATOR_REWIRING_AME.description: API key for Rewiring America energy calculator integration - Set in Heroku dashboard

REACT_APP_MUI_LICENSE_KEY.description: Material-UI Pro license key - Set in Heroku dashboard

REACT_APP_GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID.description: Google Analytics tracking ID (optional for review apps)
